channel.title: Longing For The Day Podcast
channel.description: The latest songs from Huge and the Genre Benders
channel.itunes:subtitle: One Indie musician's quest to kick the day job habit.
channel.itunes:author: Hugh Brown
channel.itunes:summary: All his life Huge has wanted to make a living from his music - this is his best shot at getting it out there ...
channel.itunes:keywords: genre benders, huge, multi-genre, Australian, Brisbane, Australia, independent, indie, alternative

item.title: Vital Signs - rough
item.author: Hugh Brown
item.description: Acoustic guitar, stomp box and vocals. Love song. All noises by Huge.
item.itunes:author: Huge
item.itunes:subtitle: Be forever mine.
item.itunes:summary: Acoustic guitar, stomp box and vocals. Love song. All noises by Huge.
item.itunes:keywords: Vital Signs, love song, huge, love, Australia, Australian music, Australian artist

item.title: Raindrops-bootleg
item.author: Hugh Brown
item.description: A capella with three voices and sound effects taken from the Freesound Project. Slow, thoughtful song about the power of what is around us to affect our lives. This version the studio bootleg from The Genre Benders' debut album "I am leaving! I am leaving!". All voices by Huge.
item.itunes:author: Huge and the Genre Benders
item.itunes:subtitle: What might be and what is.
item.itunes:summary: A capella with three voices and sound effects taken from the Freesound Project. Slow, thoughtful song about the power of what is around us to affect our lives. This version the studio bootleg from The Genre Benders' debut album "I am leaving! I am leaving!". All voices by Huge.
item.itunes:keywords: Raindrops, genre benders, huge, thoughtful, reflections on life, Australia, Australian music, Australian artist

item.title: Mighty Fine Day-bootleg
item.author: Hugh Brown
item.description: Bluesy rock track inspired by the idea of drinking at 9am on a Monday. This is one of the things that would put you in that place. This version the studio bootleg from the album. Lead guitars by Matt Mikkelsen, piano by Kathy Hirsche.
item.itunes:author: Huge and the Genre Benders
item.itunes:subtitle: Bluesy rock track inspired by the idea of drinking at 9am on a Monday.
item.itunes:summary: Bluesy rock track inspired by the idea of drinking at 9am on a Monday. This is one of the things that would put you in that place. This version the studio bootleg from the album. Lead guitars by Matt Mikkelsen, piano by Kathy Hirsche..
item.itunes:keywords: Mighty Fine Day, genre benders, huge, booze, drinking, drinking songs, alcohol, depression, breakup, Australia, Australian music, Australian artist

item.title: Lullabye-bootleg
item.author: Hugh Brown
item.description: Lullabye for Huge's unborn son. This version the studio bootleg from the album. Cello and violin by Ian Focks. guitars and vocals by Huge.

item.itunes:subtitle: Lullabye for Huge's unborn son.
item.itunes:summary: Lullabye for Huge's unborn son. This version the studio bootleg from the album. Cello and violin by Ian Focks. guitars and vocals by Huge.
item.itunes:keywords: Lullabye, lullaby, genre benders, huge, children, unborn, Australia, Australian music, Australian artist

item.title: Dirty-bootleg
item.author: Hugh Brown, Tristan Rogers
item.description: Driven pop/rock dance. All about the conflict betweeen lust and self-respect. This version the studio bootleg from the album. All instruments and noises by Huge.
item.itunes:author: Huge and the Genre Benders
item.itunes:subtitle: Let's get dirty, hot and sweaty!
item.itunes:summary: Driven pop/rock dance. All about the conflict betweeen lust and self-respect. This version the studio bootleg from the album. All instruments and noises by Huge.
item.itunes:keywords: pop, rock, genre benders, huge, party, lust, dance, Australia, Australian music, Australian artist, Tristan Rogers

item.title: Astral Traveller-bootleg
item.author: Hugh Brown, Tristan Rogers, Warren Greaves
item.description: Funky pop boogie about nothing. Don't think about it, just follow the groove to wherever it leads. This version the studio bootlegs from the album. All instruments and noises by Huge.
item.itunes:author: Huge and the Genre Benders
item.itunes:subtitle: Let's get feral, hippie!
item.itunes:summary: Funky pop boogie about nothing. Don't think about it, just follow the groove to wherever it leads. This version the studio bootlegs from the album. All instruments and noises by Huge.
item.itunes:keywords: pop, funk, genre benders, huge, party, mental wandering, Australia, Australian music, Australian artist, Tristan Rogers, Warren Greaves

item.itunes:subtitle: Let's get feral, hippie!

item.title: 12 Good Bars and True-Bootleg
item.author: The Genre Benders
item.description: Slow blues story of a muso who's been playing pop so long his tribute to the 12 bar blues is written in an 8 bar phrase. This version is the studio bootleg of the one on The Genre Benders' "I am leaving! I am leaving!" featuring lead guitars by Matt Mikkelsen.
item.itunes:author: Huge and the Genre Benders
item.itunes:subtitle: Tribute to the 12-bar Blues
item.itunes:summary: Slow blues story of a muso who's been playing pop so long his tribute to the 12-bar blues is written in an 8 bar phrase. This version is the studio bootleg of the one on The Genre Benders' "I am leaving! I am leaving!" featuring lead guitars by Matt Mikkelsen.
item.itunes:keywords: Blues, genre benders, huge, 12 bar blues, Australia, Australian music

item.title: Heart's with You-rough
item.author: Huge and the Genre Benders
item.description: Hillbilly knees-up about a loser who finds love in a bar. This version written, produced and performed by Huge in his garage.

item.title: Long 4 The Day 2006
